explains: adj. 轻快的，生气勃勃的；兴隆的，红火的；凉爽的，清新的；精干利落的，麻利的
v. 加快；使……活泼，使……兴旺

sentences.en: A brisk walk should blow the cobwebs away.
sentences.cn: 轻快的散步可以使人头脑清醒。

sentences.en: He moved at a brisk pace down the rue St. Antoine.
sentences.cn: 他沿着圣安托万街轻快地走着。

sentences.en: As they started up again, the horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 当他们又出发时，那匹马便轻快地小跑起来。
